reference.title: Hearty Vegetarian Scramble with Cheese
reference.description: A quick and delicious vegetarian scramble packed with colorful vegetables and melted cheese, perfect for a satisfying breakfast, brunch, or light meal.
ingredients: 1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar, mozzarella, or your favorite blend)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Fresh parsley or chives, chopped (for garnish, optional)
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, milk (if using), salt, and pepper until well combined.
Heat olive oil or butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add chopped onion and bell pepper and saut√© for 5-7 minutes, until softened.
Add diced tomato to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until slightly softened.
Pour the egg mixture into the skillet with the vegetables. Let it sit undisturbed for about 30 seconds until the edges begin to set.

Using a spatula, gently push the cooked egg from the edges towards the center, allowing the uncooked egg to flow underneath. Continue this process, stirring and scrambling gently, until the eggs are mostly set but still slightly moist.
Sprinkle the shredded cheese over the eggs. Cook for another 1-2 minutes, stirring gently, until the cheese is melted and incorporated.
Remove from heat. Garnish with fresh parsley or chives, if desired. Serve hot with your favorite toast or side dishes.
